elements.name: User logs in with valid phone number and password from Excel

steps.name: the user opens the mobile app
the user logs in with valid phone number and password
the user should be logged in successfully

elements.name: Add New Bill Name and Pay a bill through mobile recharge

steps.name: The user navigates to the Pay Bills Screen
The user clicks on the pay a new bill button
The user selects the United Arab Emirates as the country and Selects Package
The user clicks on the "Pay In Full" as the payment option
The user enters the Mobile Number
The user enters the Beneficiary name
The proceed to the next step
The user clicks on the "Pay In Full" as the payment option and Accept Terms & Conditions
The user clicks on the "Pay Now" button
The user enters OTP on OTP Verification Screen
